overview: Nearly half of the one million people in the United States infected with HIV are black men, women and children. Trace the history of the AIDS epidemic through the experiences of individuals who tell their stories.
tagline: Featuring Personal Stories From People With HIV and Surprising Interviews With Basketball Legend Magic Johnson, Civil Rights Pioneer Julian Bond, Health Workers, Activists and Black Pastors Around the U.S
title: Endgame: AIDS in Black America
